author: Nancy Cook
title: ‘Another nail in an almost closed coffin’: Trump faces his next coronavirus test
description: Trump’s advisers recognize his bumpy rollout of coronavirus testing represents a major vulnerability in an election year.
content: Trump has tried to circumvent his perception problem by pinning the responsibility for ramping up testing on the nations governors, who have complained for weeks about not being able to procure enough swabs, chemicals or supplies to run the actual tests. His … [+2889 chars]
